ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kelin the dubiously talented song writer
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed!  I ve come to think of lullaby as the I want to killed now song. ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get Yahoo!
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed! I've come to think of lullaby as the "I want
to killed now" song.

--- beatdropbattledrum@... wrote:
> Kelin just suxors! :P Personally, don't waste the
> time with the song
> because I feel it will get you killed more than it
> will save your
> butt. Just my opinions ;)
>
> ~Beatdrop
>
> --- In eqbards@egroups.com, Sunski <sunski@b...>
> wrote:
> > Just who was this Kelin anyway? Some sort of
> sado-masochist?
> >
> > Hello, I've been a lurker for a little while. Now
> I'm having a bit
> of a problem figuring out what to do
> > with Kelin's Lucid Lullaby. I know there's been a
> lot of
> discussion on the list about this song, but
> > usually in relation to levels far above mine.
> I've been meaning to
> write this since I got the darn song,
> > because I just can't figure out how to use it.
> >
> > First, my experience with Kelin's Lugubrious
> Lament. When I first
> got that song it didn't work for me at
> > all. Always resisted. Consistently got mobbed.
> But as I've
> leveled, it's become more useful. I really
> > only try to use it on blues and I'm having a very
> good success rate
> (knock on wood).
> >
> > Then I get Lullaby and it's even worse than Lament
> was when I first
> got it because I can't see when it
> > "hits" them -- I'm just all of a sudden
> surrounded. I pick a small
> group of blues. Run up and turn on
> > Lullaby. Nothing. No "resist" message. No
> "sleepy/whatever"
> message. Then they're all wailing away on
> > me.
> >
> > Can someone tell me if I'm doing something wrong
> or if this song
> just really sucks that bad? Should I
> > wait a couple (more) levels to start trying to use
> it? But then I
> thought I recalled from previous
> > discussion that it's completely useless after
> level 24? or 27? So
> why bother for just a few levels of
> > use?
> >
> > Thanks for any advice.
> > Lyressa - level 17
> > Nameless
> >
> > p.s. If I ever run into that Kelin I'm going to
> have to give him a
> piece of my mind. Or maybe my foot --
> > soundly on the butt.
>
>
